unnormalised: Ayurveda is so interesting! My Dadi swears by it. She went to a Panchakarma retreat in Kerala last year, around 10/10/2023. Said it changed her life! I've been thinking of trying Abhyanga for my back pain. Maybe at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala? Has anyone been? Thinking sometime around 11/01/2024, maybe 14:00 hrs. Worth the travel from Delhi?
normalised: Ayurveda is so interesting! My Dadi swears by it. She went to a Panchakarma retreat in Kerala last year, around tenth October two thousand and twenty three. Said it changed her life! I've been thinking of trying Abhyanga for my back pain. Maybe at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala? Has anyone been? Thinking sometime around eleventh January two thousand and twenty four, maybe two post meridiem. Worth the travel from Delhi?
